meanings.definition: A style of martial arts film characterized by exaggerated fight scenes and high-flying stunts.
meanings.sent1: The kids enjoyed watching the chopsocky movie with all the cool fight scenes.
meanings.sent2: The theater was showing a classic chopsocky film from the 80s.
meanings.sent3: In the chopsocky film, the hero defeated the villain with impressive moves.
meanings.sent4: Her moves on the dance floor were like chopsocky fight scenes come to life.
meanings.sent5: The chopsocky film left a lasting impression on the audience with its action-packed sequences.

meanings.definition: A film that features chopsocky-style martial arts.
meanings.sent1: We decided to watch a chopsocky after hearing about its amazing fight scenes.
meanings.sent2: The new release at the cinema turned out to be a thrilling chopsocky.
meanings.sent3: The comedy movie unexpectedly turned into a chopsocky with all the fighting.
meanings.sent4: His moves in the competition were like something out of a chopsocky film.
meanings.sent5: The actors trained hard to deliver authentic chopsocky action in the movie.

meanings.definition: To engage in chopsocky-style fighting techniques.
meanings.sent1: He loves to chopsocky with his friends in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The martial arts class teaches students how to chopsocky effectively.
meanings.sent3: She challenged him to a friendly chopsocky match to test her skills.
meanings.sent4: The dancers seemed to chopsocky their way through the routine with grace.
meanings.sent5: The warriors prepared to chopsocky against the enemy in the upcoming battle.
